summary: Implemented a tabbed dashboard UI with "Overview" and "Prices" tabs, and added a new compact Prices list view showing rank, icon (with fallback), name, symbol, and EUR price. Existing refresh interval selector, loading spinner, and error handling remain in the dashboard wrapper.

hallucinated_features.description: Added shared formatting utilities for market cap and volume (in addition to EUR price) which are not required for the new Prices-only tab feature.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires a Prices tab view and EUR price formatting for that view; market cap/volume formatters are extra beyond the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a "No data available" empty-state message for the Prices list.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask for a new empty-state UI; only specified consistent error handling for failed loads.
